txt.en: 'There are plenty of ways! Food and flowers are my favourite.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Purchase Frostbluff rotten fruit and Frostbluff flower-petals from the concession vendors. Once an actor emotes, you will be able to target the actor and use the appropriate item based on their performance. Please note that regular rotten fruit and flower-petals cannot be used inside the Frostbluff Theatre.</rgb>
How can I show my appreciation?
